    • Method Detail

      • setReboot

        public WindowsConfiguration.Builder setReboot(WindowsConfiguration.RebootOption reboot)
        A value specifying the action that should be taken after customization. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.0. If null, the WindowsConfiguration.RebootOption.REBOOT option will be chosen.
        Parameters:
        reboot - New value for the property.

      • setSysprep

        public WindowsConfiguration.Builder setSysprep(WindowsSysprep sysprep)
        Customization settings like user details, administrator details, etc for the windows guest operating system. Exactly one of getSysprep() or getSysprepXml() must be specified. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.0. If null, sysprep settings will not be applied to the windows guest operating system.
        Parameters:
        sysprep - New value for the property.

      • setSysprepXml

        public WindowsConfiguration.Builder setSysprepXml(java.lang.String sysprepXml)
        All settings specified in a XML format. This is the content of a typical answer.xml file that is used by System administrators during the Windows image customization. Check https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/update-windows-settings-and-scripts-create-your-own-answer-file-sxs Exactly one of getSysprep() or getSysprepXml() must be specified. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.0. If null, sysprep settings will not be applied to the windows guest operating system.
        Parameters:
        sysprepXml - New value for the property.

      • build

        public WindowsConfiguration build()
